title: Looking for any average players for ranked/normals!
body:
Hi, I wouldn't say i'm a brilliant player, but I am just looking for some people to play league with, I recently stopped playing with a group of friends who decided they were to good for me. Anyway, if you would be interested in playing, you can join my raidcall group 'Guardians of Fortune'. Personally I prefer raidcall over skype for the simple fact that people can join the group, and start talking to me without them having to minimize my game or distract me. If you have any questions post them below or email me at 'skygoinghigh@gmail.com'.

Raidcall DL link: http://www.raidcall.com/download.html
Group link (if needed): http://www.raidcall.com/go.php?sid=10271319

- Thanks

replies.body:
I noticed you haven't had any hits, I'm actually looking for a Diamond+ coach at the moment, but they're not easy to find unless you have the money.

Until then, I'd happily play a few games with you.

Add me if you like.

Hi I'm in bronze 2 dunno if that's what your aiming for or what not but anyways if your interested I'm a mid laner assassins mostly XD but I can also do every other if needed.

Add me if you want just msg me to let me know.
